role_description: An Ansible role that installs HTTPie (a user-friendly, command-line HTTP client) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [HTTPie](https://httpie.io/) is a terminal-based, user-friendly command-line HTTP client for the API era. It comes with JSON support, syntax highlighting, persistent sessions, wget-like downloads, plugins, and more.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs HTTPie (a user-friendly, command-line HTTP client) on nearly any platform.
